patthana15.34:1.1: Āsavavippayuttaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naāsavasampayutto nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ.
patthana15.34:2.1: Āsavasampayuttaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naāsavasampayutto naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana15.34:3.1: Āsavavippayuttaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paccayā naāsavasampayutto naabyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
